DOC.brief_summary: This Phase 3 , multi-site , non-randomized , open-label study evaluate safety efficacy MK-7625A 1.5 g ( ceftolozane 1 g/tazobactam 0.5 g ) plus metronidazole 500 mg treatment Complicated Intra-abdominal Infections ( cIAI ) Japanese participant . Efficacy primarily assess clinical response define complete resolution significant improvement sign symptom index infection .
